_instructions.setup: Copy this file to ebay_config.json and fill in your credentials

api_credentials.app_id: Get from developer.ebay.com - this is your Client ID
api_credentials.client_secret: Get from developer.ebay.com - keep this secret!

email.password: Use a Gmail App Password (16 chars), NOT your regular password

_instructions.searches: Add your search queries below. Copy a block to add more.

searches.name: Example Search
searches._note: include_auctions defaults to false (Buy It Now only) per eBay Growth Check requirements
